#summary The protocol used by Rouge server.

=Server & Authentification=

== login==

===in===
  * username: string
  * password: string
===out===
  * ret: boolean

==user.create==

===in===
  * username: string
  * password: string
  * firstname: string
  * lastname: string
  * email: string
===out (success)===
  * id: long
  * ret: boolean
===out (error)===
  * ret: boolean
  * error: string

==logoff==

===out===
  * ret: boolean

==server.kicked==

Never sent from client
===out===
  * reason: string

=Instant Message=

==im.msg==

===in===
  * username: string
  * msg: string
===out===
  * ret: boolean

==im.recv==

Never sent from client
===out===
  * msg: string	

=Achievements=

==ach.get==

===in===
  * none 
===out===
  * ach : RougeArray of RougeObject
    * key: string
    * point: int
    * progress: double
    * total: double
  * ret: boolean

==ach.update==

===in===
  * key: string
  * progress: double
===out===
  * key: string
  * progress: double

=Leaderboards=

==leaderboard.get==

===in===
  * key: string
===out===
  * key: string
  * scores: RougeArray of RougeObject
    * user: string
    * score: long
  * ret: boolean

==leaderboard.gets==

===in===
  * None
===out===
  * leaderboard: RougeArray of RougeObject
    * key: string
    * scores: RougeArray of RougeObject
      * user: string
      * score: long
  * ret: boolean

==leaderboard.submit==

===in===
  * key: string
  * score: long
===out===
  * key: string
  * ret: boolean

=Mail=

==mail.getall==

===in===
  * None
===out===
  * mails: RougeArray of RougeObject
    * id: long
    * to: long
    * from: long
    * content: RougeObject
  * ret: boolean

==mail.getunread==

===in===
* None
===out===
  * mails: RougeArray of RougeObject
    * id: long
    * to: long
    * from: long
    * content: RougeObject
  * ret: boolean

==mail.send==

===in===
  * long: to
  * content: RougeObject
===out===
  * ret: boolean

==mail.setread==

===in===
  * id: long
===out===
 * ret: boolean

==mail.delete==

===in===
  * id: long
===out===
 * ret: boolean

=Rooms=

==room.create==

===in===
  * name: key
===out===
  * ret: boolean

==room.delete==

===in===
  * name: key
===out===
  * ret: boolean

==room.join==

===in===
  * name: key
===out===
  * ret: boolean

==room.leave==

===in===
  * name: key
===out===
  * ret: boolean

==room.say==

===in===
  * name: key
  * msg: RougeObject
===out===
  * ret: boolean

==room.recv==

Never sent from client
===out===
  * name: key
  * msg: RougeObject
  * ret: boolean

==room.kicked==

Never sent from client
===out===
  * name: string

==room.destroy==
Never sent from client
===out===
  * name: string

==room.whois==
===in===
  * None
===out===
  * people: RougeArray of String (usernames)
  * ret: boolean

==var.set==
===in===
  * key: string
  * value: RougeObject
===out===
  * key: string
  * ret: boolean

==var.get==
===in===
  * key: string
===out===
  * key: string
  * value: RougeObject
  * ret: boolean

==var.sub==
===in===
  * key: string
===out===
  * key: string
  * ret: boolean

==var.unsub==
===in===
  * key: string
===out===
  * key: string
  * ret: boolean

==var.pset==
===in===
  * key: string
  * value: RougeObject
  * version: long
===out===
  * key: string
  * ret: boolean

==var.pget==
===in===
  * key: string
===out===
  * key: string
  * value: RougeObject
  * ret: boolean
  * version: long
